body_html: I think the feature request makes sense. Unfortunately, because SparseTensor.dense_shape is a Tensor, I'm afraid that we have to use session to calculate the value of shape, eg sess.run(z.dense_shape)
body_text: I think the feature request makes sense. Unfortunately, because SparseTensor.dense_shape is a Tensor, I'm afraid that we have to use session to calculate the value of shape, eg sess.run(z.dense_shape)
body: I think the feature request makes sense. Unfortunately, because SparseTensor.dense_shape is a Tensor, I'm afraid that we have to use session to calculate the value of shape, eg `sess.run(z.dense_shape)`
